resources.string: Choose your departure address and your destination
Do not miss your neck again,a few minutes will be enough to inform you.
An error has occurred,make sure you have a stable internet connection and try again.
Here you shout out rides.You thumbs up Aussie rides from their appropriate details page .
Are you sure you definitely want to delete this route?
Are you sure you want to report a delay of this schedule?

EL Cous is timetable management application for "Cous" university buses.It allows you to search all timetables for each bus trip ,you can also report the delay of a bus if you are on site to inform other students. The administrator present get to access the administrator area with the key to add or delete trips.
